public int bsearch(int[] a, int n, int value) {
  int low = 0;
  int high = n - 1;

  while (low <= high) {
    int mid = (low + high) / 2;
    if (a[mid] == value) {
      return mid;
    } else if (a[mid] < value) {
      low = mid + 1;
    } else {
      high = mid - 1;
    }
  }

  return -1;
}

low=mid+1ï¼Œhigh=mid-1ã€‚æ³¨æ„è¿™é‡Œçš„+1å’Œ-1ï¼Œå¦‚æœç›´æ¥å†™æˆlow=midæˆ–è€…high=midï¼Œå°±å¯èƒ½ä¼šå‘ç”Ÿæ­»å¾ªç¯ã€‚æ¯”å¦‚ï¼Œå½“high=3ï¼Œlow=3æ—¶ï¼Œå¦‚æœa[3]ä¸ç­‰äºvalueï¼Œå°±ä¼šå¯¼è‡´ä¸€ç›´å¾ªç¯ä¸é€€å‡ºã€‚

æˆ‘ç”¨Javaè¯­è¨€å®ç°äº†ä¸€ä¸‹è¿™ä¸ªè¿‡ç¨‹ï¼Œæ­£å¥½ä½ å¯ä»¥å€Ÿæ­¤æœºä¼šå›é¡¾ä¸€ä¸‹å†™é€’å½’ä»£ç çš„æŠ€å·§ã€‚

// äºŒåˆ†æŸ¥æ‰¾çš„é€’å½’å®ç°
public int bsearch(int[] a, int n, int val) {
  return bsearchInternally(a, 0, n - 1, val);
}

private int bsearchInternally(int[] a, int low, int high, int value) {
  if (low > high) return -1;

  int mid =  low + ((high - low) >> 1);
  if (a[mid] == value) {
    return mid;
  } else if (a[mid] < value) {
    return bsearchInternally(a, mid+1, high, value);
  } else {
    return bsearchInternally(a, low, mid-1, value);
  }
}

public int binarySearch(int[] a, int val){
return bSear(a, val, 0, a.length-1);
}
private int bSear(int[] a, int val, int start, int end) {
if(start > end) return -1;
int mid = start + (end - start) / 2;
if(a[mid] == val) return mid;
else if(a[mid] > val) end = mid - 1;
else start = mid + 1;
return bSear(a, val, start, end);
}

/**

public static double getSqureRoot(int n, double deltaThreshold) {
double low = 1.0;
double high = (double) n;
while (low <= high) {
double mid = low + ((high - low) / 2);
double square = mid * mid;
double delta = Math.abs(square / n - 1);
if (delta < deltaThreshold) {
return mid;
} else if (square < n) {
low = mid;
} else {
high = mid;
}
}
return -1.0;
}

def bsearch(ls, value):

def bsearch_recursively(ls, low, high, value):

def sqrt_search(value, n=6):
'''
æ±‚ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°çš„å¹³æ–¹æ ¹(åˆ©ç”¨äºŒåˆ†æ³•æŸ¥æ‰¾çš„æ€æƒ³ï¼Œæ…¢æ…¢æŸ¥å‡ºæœ€ç¬¦åˆç²¾ç¡®å€¼çš„æ•°å€¼å³å¯)
:param value: éœ€è¦æ±‚çš„æ•°å€¼
:param n: ä¿ç•™å‡ ä½å°æ•°(é»˜è®¤6ä½å°æ•°)
:return: è¿”å›æ•°å€¼çš„å¹³æ–¹æ ¹ï¼ˆä¸€èˆ¬ç»“æœæ˜¯åˆ†æ­£æ•°å’Œè´Ÿæ•°ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œåªè¿”å›æ­£æ•°ï¼‰
'''
if value < 0: raise Exception('ä¸èƒ½å°äº0')
if value == 0 or value == 1: return value

# ç¡®å®šåˆå§‹åŒºé—´
low = 0
hight = 1
if value >= 4 : # ä»»ä½•å¤§äºç­‰äº4çš„æ•°çš„å¹³æ–¹æ ¹éƒ½ä¸ä¼šå¤§äºè¿™ä¸ªæ•°çš„ä¸€åŠ

mid = hight
bit = 0.1 ** n
# å¦‚æœç”¨mid * mid åˆ¤æ–­çš„è¯æœ‰æº¢å‡ºçš„é£é™©
while abs(hight - low) > bit: # åˆ¤æ–­æ¡ä»¶ä¸ºmidå¹³æ–¹å‡å»valueçš„ç»å¯¹å€¼<=éœ€è¦ä¿ç•™çš„ç²¾åº¦æ—¶æ¨å‡ºæŸ¥æ‰¾
tmp = mid * mid
if tmp == value:
return mid
elif (tmp - value) > bit:
hight = mid
elif (tmp - value) < bit:
low = mid
mid = low + ((hight - low)) / 2.0
return round(mid, n)

public static BigDecimal squareRoot(BigDecimal a) {
a = a.setScale(6,BigDecimal.ROUND_DOWN);
BigDecimal mid = a.divide(BigDecimal.valueOf(2));
BigDecimal low = BigDecimal.valueOf(0);
BigDecimal high = a;
// å¦‚æœa<1,åˆ™å¹³æ–¹æ ¹æ¯”aè¦å¤§,æ‰€ä»¥highåˆå§‹å€¼=1
if (a.compareTo(new BigDecimal(1)) < 0) {
high = new BigDecimal(1);
}
while (high.compareTo(low) >= 0) {
BigDecimal multiply = mid.multiply(mid).setScale(6, BigDecimal.ROUND_DOWN);
if (multiply.equals(a)) {
break;
} else if (multiply.compareTo(a) > 0) {
// midçš„å¹³æ–¹å¤§äºa,å¹³æ–¹æ ¹è‚¯å®šæ˜¯åœ¨lowå’Œmidä¹‹é—´ åˆ™æ›´æ–°high=mid
high = mid;
mid = low.add(high).divide(BigDecimal.valueOf(2));
} else {
// midçš„å¹³æ–¹å°äºa,è¯´æ˜å¹³æ–¹æ ¹è‚¯å®šåœ¨midå’Œhighä¹‹é—´,åˆ™æ›´æ–°low=mid
low = mid;
mid = low.add(high).divide(BigDecimal.valueOf(2));
}
}
return mid.setScale(6, BigDecimal.ROUND_DOWN);
}

break;
} else if (multiply.compareTo(a) > 0) {
// midçš„å¹³æ–¹å¤§äºa,å¹³æ–¹æ ¹è‚¯å®šæ˜¯åœ¨lowå’Œmidä¹‹é—´ åˆ™æ›´æ–°high=mid
high = mid;
mid = low.add(high).divide(BigDecimal.valueOf(2));
} else {
// midçš„å¹³æ–¹å°äºa,è¯´æ˜å¹³æ–¹æ ¹è‚¯å®šåœ¨midå’Œhighä¹‹é—´,åˆ™æ›´æ–°low=mid
low = mid;
mid = low.add(high).divide(BigDecimal.valueOf(2));
}
}
return mid.setScale(6, BigDecimal.ROUND_DOWN);
}

function sqrtRoot(n){

// ç‰¹åˆ«çš„ï¼Œå½“è¾“å…¥çš„å€¼æ˜¯å°æ•°çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œmidå¾€è¾¹ç•Œé æ‹¢æ—¶ï¼Œæ°¸è¿œå¾—åˆ°çš„æ˜¯å°æ•°å€¼ï¼Œè¿™æ ·åªä¼šæ— é™å¾€rightå€¼é è¿‘ï¼Œæœ€ç»ˆåªä¼šè·³å‡ºå¾ªç¯ä¹Ÿæ‰¾ä¸åˆ°ï¼Œå› ä¸ºæ ¹æœ¬å°±ä¸åœ¨å®ƒçš„å·¦è¾¹ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªæ—¶å€™å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ä»¥ä¸‹åŠæ³•
// è®¾ç½®leftä¸ºnå€¼ï¼Œrightä¸º1ï¼Œåœ¨n-1ä¹‹é—´æ‰¾
let right = isDecimal ? 1 : n;

/**

* @param value æ•°
* @param accuracy å°æ•°ä½æ•°
* @return
*/
public static double square(double value, int accuracy){
//æŠŠå®ƒè½¬æ¢æˆæ±‚æ•´æ•°é—®é¢˜, ç²¾åº¦ä¸º1, å†è½¬æ¢ä¸ºå°æ•°
double bigValue = value * Math.pow(10, accuracy * 2);
int low = 0;
int high = (int) Math.ceil(bigValue);

//äºŒåˆ†æ³•æŸ¥æ‰¾i i^2<bigValue&&(i+1)^2>bigValue
while(low <= high){
int mid = ((high - low) >> 1) + low;
if (Math.pow(mid, 2) <= bigValue && Math.pow(mid + 1, 2) > bigValue) {
return mid / Math.pow(10, accuracy);
}else if(Math.pow(mid, 2) > bigValue){
high = mid - 1;
}else{
low = mid + 1;
}
}
return -1D;
}

/**
* äºŒåˆ†æ³•æ±‚å¹³æ–¹æ ¹
* @param n
*/
function sqrt(n) {
const error = 0.000001;
let lowerLimit = 0;
let upperLimit = n;
while (error < upperLimit - lowerLimit) {
let mid = (upperLimit + lowerLimit) / 2
if (mid * mid == n) {
return mid;
} else if (mid * mid > n) {
upperLimit = mid
} else {
lowerLimit = mid;
}
}
return (upperLimit + lowerLimit) / 2;
}

}

high := flX
low := flX / 2.0
// 4,16ç­‰åˆšå¥½æ˜¯2çš„å¶æ¬¡å¹‚ï¼Œä¸å¿…å¤šèµ°äºŒåˆ†ï¼›å¹¶ä¸”è®©low<sqrt(x)

}
}

delta := 0.0000001
for i := 1; ; i++ {

if powMid == flX {

} else if powMid > flX {

}
low = mid
}
}
return format(0, 0, -1.0)
}

double MySqrt(double x) {
assert(x > 0);
double low = 0;
double high = x;
double p = 1e-6;
while (1) {

if (mid * mid > x) high = mid - p;
else low = mid + p;
}
}

const precision = 0.000001
function recursionSqrt(v, low, high) {
const middle = (low + high) / 2
const absDiff = Math.abs(middle * middle - v)
if (absDiff <= precision) return Number(middle.toFixed(6))
if (middle * middle > v) {
return recursionSqrt(v, low, middle)
} else {
return recursionSqrt(v, middle, high)
}
}

private static <T>
int indexedBinarySearch(List<? extends Comparable<? super T>> list, T key) {
int low = 0;
int high = list.size()-1;

while (low <= high) {
int mid = (low + high) >>> 1;
Comparable<? super T> midVal = list.get(mid);
int cmp = midVal.compareTo(key);

if (cmp < 0)
low = mid + 1;
else if (cmp > 0)
high = mid - 1;
else
return mid; // key found
}
return -(low + 1); // key not found
}

/// è®¡ç®—å¤§äº1çš„æ­£æ•´æ•°ä¹‹å¹³æ–¹æ ¹
/// - Parameters:
/// - n: å¾…æ±‚çš„æ•°
/// - deltaThreshold: è¯¯å·®çš„é˜ˆå€¼
/// - maxTry: äºŒåˆ†æŸ¥æ‰¾çš„æœ€å¤§æ¬¡æ•°
/// - Returns: å¹³æ–¹æ ¹çš„è§£
func getSquareRoot(n :Int, deltaThreshold: Double, maxTry: Int) -> Double? {
if n <= 1 {
return nil;
}

var min = 1.0, max = Double(n)
var middle, square, delta: Double
for _ in 0..<maxTry {
middle = min + (max - min) / 2
square = middle * middle
delta = fabs((square - Double(n)) / Double(n))
if delta <= deltaThreshold {
return middle
} else {
if square > Double(n) {
max = middle
} else {
min = middle
}
}
}

return nil;
}

float CarmackSqrt(float x)
{
float xhalf = 0.5f * x;

int i = *(int*)&x; // get bits for floating VALUE
i = 0x5f3759df - (i >> 1); // gives initial guess y0
x = *(float*)&i; // convert bits BACK to float
x = x * (1.5f - xhalf * x*x); // Newton step, repeating increases accuracy
x = x * (1.5f - xhalf * x*x); // Newton step, repeating increases accuracy
x = x * (1.5f - xhalf * x*x); // Newton step, repeating increases accuracy
return (1 / x);
}

while (hi - lo >= 0.000001) {

}
}
return ret
}

func sqrt(num float64, precision int) float64 {
if num < 0 || precision > 15 {

}
var low float64 = 0
var high = num
if num < 1 {
low = num
high = 1
}
var mid float64
var precisionDecimal float64 = 1
for i := 0; i < precision; i++ {
precisionDecimal = precisionDecimal / 10
}
for high-low > precisionDecimal {
//é¿å…low+highæº¢å‡º

//é¿å…mid*midæº¢å‡º
divide := num / mid
if mid == divide {
return mid
}
if mid < divide {
low = mid
}
if mid > divide {
high = mid
}
}

public double sqrt(double num) {
double left = 0.0;
double right = num / 1.0;
if (num < 1)
right = 1.0;
// l: 0, r: 0.04
double precision = 0.0001;
// binary search
while (right - left > precision) {
double mid = left + (right - left)/2.0;
if (mid - num/mid > precision) {
right = mid;
} else if (num/mid - mid > precision){
left = mid;
} else if (Math.abs(mid * mid - num) <= precision)
return mid;
}
return left;
}

public static double rightFind(int x){

while(Math.abs(mid*mid-x)>=1e-6){

break;
else if(square < x)
left = mid ;
else
right = mid;
mid = left + (right-left)/2;
}
return mid;
}

func bSearch(a []int, value int) int {
low := 0
high := len(a) - 1
for low <= high {
mid := (high - low) + low>>1
if a[mid] == value {
return mid
} else if a[mid] < value {

}

func bSearch2(a []int, value int) int {
return bSearchInternally(a, 0, len(a)-1, value)
}

func bSearchInternally(a []int, head, tail, value int) int {
mid := head + (tail-head)>>1
if a[mid] == value {
return mid
} else if a[mid] < value {
return bSearchInternally(a, mid+1, tail, value)
} else {
return bSearchInternally(a, head, mid-1, value)
}
}

public static double getSqureRoot2(double n, double deltaThreshold, int maxTry) {
if (n <= 0) return -1.0;

double min = 0, max = n;

while (min <= max) {
double mid = min + ((max - min) / 2);
double rMax = (mid + deltaThreshold) * (mid + deltaThreshold);
double rMin = (mid - deltaThreshold) * (mid - deltaThreshold);
if (rMin < n && rMax > n) {
return mid;
} else if (rMin > n) {
max = mid;
} else {
min = mid;
}
}

return -2.0;
}

/**

* @param x

private static int binaryGetBase(double x){
int start = (int) x;
int base = start;
while(start * start > x){
base = start;
start = start / 2;
}

if(base * base == x) return base;

// æŒ‰ä¸­ä½æ­¥è¿›
int end = base;
while(start <= end){
int mid = (start + end) /2;
if(mid * mid == x){
return mid;
}else if (mid * mid < x){
base = start;
start = mid + 1;
}else{
end = mid - 1;
base = end;
}
}

return base;

}

/**
* ç»™å®šä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ä»¥åŠä»–çš„å¹³æ–¹æ ¹çš„æ•´æ•°éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œè®¡ç®—å°æ•°éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œç²¾ç¡®åˆ° precision
* @param x
* @param base
* @return
*/
private static double binaryGetFloat(double x, double base, int precision){
if(precision == 0){
return base;
}
double float_base = base;
double step = 0.1f;
for (int i = 1; i <= precision; i++) {
// ä» 0 - 9 å¼€å§‹æ­¥è¿›
int l = 0;
int r = 9;
int cur = 0;
while(l <= r){
int mid = (l + r)/2;
double result = Math.pow(float_base + mid * step, 2);
if(result > x){
r = mid - 1;
cur = r;
}else if (result < x){
cur = l;
l = mid + 1;
}else{
return float_base + mid * step;
}
}

float_base += cur * step;
step *= step;
}

return float_base;
}

class Solution {
public double sqrt(int x, double precision) {
double low = 0;
double hi = (x >> 1) + 1;
double pre;
double mid = (low + hi) / 2;
do {
double result = mid * mid;
if (result == x) return mid;
else if (result > x) hi = mid - 1;
else low = mid + 1;
pre = mid;
mid = (low + hi) / 2;
} while (Math.abs(pre - mid) > precision);
BigDecimal bg = new BigDecimal(mid);
double res = bg.setScale(6, BigDecimal.ROUND_HALF_UP).doubleValue();
return res;
}
}

float squareRoot(float n) {
float l = 0, r = n;
while (l + 0.000001 < r) {
float mid = l + (r - l) / 2;
float midSquare = mid * mid;
if (midSquare > n) {
r = mid;
} else if (midSquare < n) {
l = mid;
} else {
return mid;
}
}
float lCut = ((int)(l * 1000000)) / 1000000.0f;
float rCut = ((int)(r * 1000000)) / 1000000.0f;
float lSquare = lCut * lCut, rSquare = rCut * rCut;
return Math.abs(lSquare - (float)n) < Math.abs(rSquare - (float)n) ? lCut : rCut;
}

private static int binarySearch0(int[] a, int fromIndex, int toIndex,
int key) {
int low = fromIndex;
int high = toIndex - 1;

while (low <= high) {
int mid = (low + high) >>> 1;
int midVal = a[mid];

if (midVal < key)
low = mid + 1;
else if (midVal > key)
high = mid - 1;
else
return mid; // key found
}

import org.junit.Assert;
import org.junit.Test;

import java.math.BigDecimal;

public class SqrTest {
public static long sqr(float n, int bit) {
StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
for (int i=0;i<bit*2;i++) {
sb.append("0");
}
BigDecimal m = new BigDecimal((long)n+sb.toString());
BigDecimal l = new BigDecimal(0);
BigDecimal r = m;
BigDecimal two = new BigDecimal(2);
BigDecimal one = new BigDecimal(1);
BigDecimal mid = m.divide(two);
BigDecimal tmp = new BigDecimal(1);
int count = 0;
while (l.compareTo(r)<0) {
tmp = mid.multiply(mid);
if (tmp.compareTo(m)<0) {
l = mid.add(one);
} else {
r = mid;
}
mid = (l.add(r)).divide(two);
count++;
if (count>1000) {
break;
}
}
return l.longValue();
}

@Test
public void test() {
//Given
float n = 999999999999.0f;

//When
long result = SqrTest.sqr(n, 6);

//Then
long y = Math.round(Math.sqrt(n)*1000000);
Assert.assertTrue(Math.abs(y-result)<2);
}
}

function msqrt($num, $digits = 6)
{
if ($num < 0) {
return NAN;
}

$low = 0;
$high = $num;
$deltaThreshold = pow(10, $digits * -1);
while ($low <= $high) {
$mid = $low + (($high - $low) / 2);
$square = $mid * $mid;
$delta = abs($square / $num - 1);
if ($delta < $deltaThreshold) {
return $mid;
}
if ($square >= $num) {
$high = $mid;
} else {
$low = $mid;
}
}
return -1;
}

def _sqrt(num, low, high, i):
"""å¯¹[low, high]èŒƒå›´å†…çš„iä½æ•°äºŒåˆ†æŸ¥æ‰¾ç¡®å®šnumçš„å¹³æ–¹æ ¹

else:
high = round(mid-1/(10**i),i)

private static BigDecimal square(BigDecimal item){
BigDecimal min = BigDecimal.valueOf(0);
BigDecimal max = item;
BigDecimal half = BigDecimal.valueOf(-1);
while (min.compareTo(max)<=0){
half = (max.add(min)).divide(BigDecimal.valueOf(2),6, RoundingMode.HALF_UP);
if (half.multiply(half).compareTo(item)<0){
min = half.add(BigDecimal.valueOf(0.000001));
}else {
max = half.subtract(BigDecimal.valueOf(0.000001));
}
}
return half;
}

public static double sqrtByBinary(double x){
double low = 0;
double high = x;
double power = low;
double answer = low;
while(Math.abs(power-x)>0.000001){
double mid = (low+high)/2;
power = mid*mid;
if(power>x){
high = mid-1;
}else if(power<=x){
low = mid+1;
answer = mid;
}
}
return answer;
}

public static BigDecimal squareRoot(BigDecimal number){
BigDecimal min = BigDecimal.ZERO;
BigDecimal max = number;
BigDecimal targetTemp = number;
while (min.compareTo(max) <= 0) {
BigDecimal half = min.add(max).divide(BigDecimal.valueOf(2),6,BigDecimal.ROUND_HALF_UP);
BigDecimal temp = half.multiply(half).setScale(6,BigDecimal.ROUND_HALF_UP);
int compare = number.compareTo(temp);
if (compare == 0) {
return half;
} else if (compare < 0) {
max = half;
} else {
min = half;
}
if (targetTemp.compareTo(temp) == 0) {
return half;
} else {
targetTemp = temp;
}
}
return null;
}

/**

public static double square(double n) {
if (n == 0 || n == 1) {
return 1;
}
double low = 0, high = n;
double middle = low + (high - low) / 2;
while (Math.abs(middle * middle - n) > 0.000001) {
if (middle * middle > n) {
high = middle;
} else if (middle * middle < n) {
low = middle;
} else {
return middle;
}
middle = low + (high - low) / 2;
}
return middle;
}

public static double getSquareRoot(int data){
if(data < 0){
return -1;
}
double low = 0.0;
double high = data;
double mid = 0.0;
while(isNumOfDigLessThenInput(mid, 6) ){
mid = low + ((high - low) / 2);
if(data == mid*mid){
return mid;
}else if(data < mid*mid){
high = mid;
}else{
low = mid;
}
}
return mid;
}

private static boolean isNumOfDigLessThenInput(double data,int num){
String dataStr = String.valueOf(data);
int index = dataStr.indexOf(".");
if(index == -1){
return true;
}
int numofDig = dataStr.length() - index;
return numofDig <= 6;
}

// æ±‚å¹³æ–¹æ ¹
public static float sq(int n, float l, float r) {
if (l > r) {
return r;
}

float m = l + ((r - l) / 2);
if (m * m > n) {
return sq(n, l, m - 0.0000001f);
} else if (m * m < n) {
return sq(n, m + 0.0000001f, r);
} else {
return m;
}
}

def bin_search(arrs, val):
'''
äºŒåˆ†æŸ¥æ‰¾
'''
return bin_serach_inner(arrs, 0, len(arrs) - 1, val)


def bin_serach_inner(arrs, low, high, value):
if low > high: return -1
mid = low + ((high - low) >> 1)
if arrs[mid] == value:
return mid
elif arrs[mid] < value:
return bin_serach_inner(arrs, mid + 1, high, value)
else:
return bin_serach_inner(arrs, low, mid - 1, value)

public class Main {

public static void main(String[] args) {

int value = 120;
float low = 1f;
float high = (1.000000f * value) / 2;
System.out.println(getSquaerRoot(value, low, high));
}

//å¦‚ä½•ç¼–ç¨‹å®ç°â€œæ±‚ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°çš„å¹³æ–¹æ ¹â€ï¼Ÿè¦æ±‚ç²¾ç¡®åˆ°å°æ•°ç‚¹å 6 ä½

public static float getSquaerRoot(int value, float low, float high) {
float mid = low + ((high - low) / 2);
if (Math.abs(value - mid * mid) < 0.00001F) {
return mid;
} else if (mid * mid < value) {
return getSquaerRoot(value, mid, high);
} else {
return getSquaerRoot(value, low, mid);
}
}

}
